---
title: "Marrakesh, Morocco"
---

The souks of Marrakesh beat the Grand Bazaar in Istanbul any day.

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE}
kutubiyyaMosque <- paste("<b>Kutubiyya Mosque</b>")
bahiaPalace <- paste("<b>Bahia Palace</b>")
badiPalace <- paste("<b>Badi Palace</b>")
bachaCoffee <- paste("<b>Bacha Coffee</b>")
trainStation <- paste("<b>Train Station</b>")
jemaaElFenaa <- paste("<b>Jemaa el-Fenaa</b>")
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  setView(-4.014088, 31.099917, zoom = 13) %>%
  addMarkers(-4.008162, 31.084677, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = kutubiyyaMosque) %>% # Kutubiyya Mosque
  addMarkers(-4.017317, 31.098758, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = bahiaPalace) %>% # Bahia Palace
  addMarkers(-4.008162, 31.084677, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = badiPalace) %>% # Badi Palace
  addMarkers(-4.017317, 31.098758, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = bachaCoffee) %>% # Bacha Coffee
  addMarkers(-4.008162, 31.084677, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = trainStation) %>% # Train Station
  addMarkers(-3.986059, 31.083429, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = jemaaElFenaa) # Jemaa el-Fenaa
```
